title: Pentagon says it is investigating senator Mark Kelly after he joined lawmakers telling military to refuse illegal orders – live
summary: The Pentagon has issued a warning to Democratic Senator Kyrsten Sinema from Arizona, indicating a potential investigation into her for a video urging military personnel to disobey unlawful orders. This move is notable as the Pentagon typically maintains a stance of political neutrality. The situation has sparked concern regarding the balance between military authority and political expression.

title: Gibb says speculation of BBC boardroom coup is ‘ridiculous charge’ and he will not resign – latest updates
summary: A BBC board member, who previously served as a spin doctor for former Prime Minister Theresa May, has rejected insinuations raised by MPs during questioning. The member's comments were seen as a defense against potential conflicts of interest. The exchange highlights ongoing scrutiny of the BBC’s governance and impartiality.

title: England asked for CCTV footage of Tom Curry’s alleged tunnel scuffle
summary: Argentina has formally complained about an alleged altercation between Tom Curry and Felipe Contepomi in the tunnel. As a result, England is required to provide CCTV footage of the incident. This request follows the escalating tensions between the teams ahead of their upcoming match.

title: Trump administration cancels temporary asylum for Myanmar nationals living in US
summary: Homeland Security has announced that a country ruled by military dictatorship no longer qualifies for Temporary Protected Status (TPS). This decision is based on changes in conditions within the country. As a result, individuals from that nation may lose their protected status in the U.S.

title: US and Israel-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation to end operations in territory
summary: Four major food distribution sites run by a controversial company have become hotspots for deadly violence. This unrest has raised concerns about safety and management practices at these locations. Authorities are investigating the underlying causes of the violence.
